comments.en:
For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

I didn't find anything about this model on HP's home page. Probably similar to the DeskJet 815C. The developers of HP's HPLIP driver list it as a supported device.

Consumables/Refills: 51645 (black), C1823 (tri-color)
